wikipedia_page.main: Thomas Clarke (November 19, 1911 – February 14, 1969) was a British skeleton racer who competed in the late 1940s. He finished ninth in the skeleton event at the 1948 Winter Olympics in St. Moritz.

response: * Thomas Clarke (died 1754) (c. 1672–1754), British lawyer and politician, MP for Hertford

* Thomas Clarke (skeleton racer) (1911–1969), British skeleton racer
* Thomas Clarke (footballer) (born 1989), formerly with Yeovil Town
